name: Pitt Projects
description: A collection of projects done at the University of Pittsburgh

children.description: Selected projects from CS 0445 - Data Structures

children.name: War Card Game
children.description: A Java program that simulates the card game War

children.name: Fruit Market Simulator
children.description: A fruit market stand simulator written in Java

children.name: Auto-Word Search
children.description: An auto-completing word search written in Java

children.name: CS 0447
children.description: Selected projects from CS 0447 - Computer Organization and Assembly Language

children.name: Assembly Auto Coder
children.description: A program that automatically generates MIPS assembly code written in MIPS assembly

children.name: Single-Datapath CPU
children.description: A Logisim circuit file that emulates a single-datapath CPU

children.name: CS 0449
children.description: Projects from CS 0449 - Introduction to Systems Software

children.name: Blackjack
children.description: A C program that simulates the card game Blackjack

children.name: ID3 v1.1 Tag Editor
children.description: A C program that reads and writes ID3 v1.1 music tags

children.name: Program String Parser
children.description: A C program that parses files for displayable strings

children.name: Custom malloc()
children.description: A custom suite of memory de/allocation functions written in C

children.name: CS 1501
children.description: Selected projects from CS 1501 - Algorithm Implementation

children.name: Password Checker
children.description: A Java program that checks an entered password against a generated list

children.name: CS 1632
children.description: Selected projects from CS 1632 - Software Quality Assurance

children.name: JUnit Test Suite
children.description: Contains a Java text game built in according to guidelines and backed with JUnit tests

children.name: Selenium Testing
children.description: Contains JUnit tests for nasioc.com using BDD principles

children.name: Property-Based Testing
children.description: Holds JUnit property-based tests of a sorted array
